S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: beaufortForce
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Wind force scale, originally based on the state of the sea, expressed in numbers from 0 to 12, as defined by WMO (WMO 306 Manual on Codes, Volume I.1 - International Codes).
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Note: for S-412, we will limit the attribute to enumeration values 7-12.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: calm
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Absence of air motion or wind with a speed of less than 1 knot (Beaufort scale wind force 0).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: light air
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind with a speed between 1 and 3 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 1)

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: ligth breeze
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind with a speed between 4 and 6 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 2).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: gentle breeze
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind with a speed between 7 and 10 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 3).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: moderate breeze
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind with a speed between 11 and 16 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 4).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: fresh breeze
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind with a speed between 17 and 21 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 5).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: strong breeze
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind with a speed between 22 and 27 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 6).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: near gale
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind with a speed between 28 and 33 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 7).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: gale
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind with a speed between 34 and 40 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 8).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: strong glae
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind with a speed between 41 and 47 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 9).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: storm
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind with a speed between 48 and 55 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 10).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: violent storm
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind with a speed between 56 and 63 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 11).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: hurricane
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: (1) Term, derived from a Caribbean word, first applied to tropical cyclones of the Caribbean Sea. (2) Wind with a speed 64 knots or higher (Beaufort scale wind force 12).

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: iceAccretionRate
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Represents the ice accretion warning that has been exceeded or forecast to be exceeded based on ice accumulation rates.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: moderateIcing
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Ice accumulation rates between 0.7 and 2 centimeters per hour are forecast or occurring.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: severeIcing
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Ice accumulation rates greater than or equal to 2 centimeters per hour are forecast or occurring.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: metareaName
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A name referencing a defined geographical area of the ocean used to coordinate the transmission of meteorological information and services to mariners.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA I
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 1.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA II
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 2.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA III
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 3.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA IV
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 4.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA V
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 5.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA VI
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 6.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA VII
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 7.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA VIII
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 8.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA IX
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 9.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA X
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 10.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA XI
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 11.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA XII
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 12.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA XIII
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 13.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA XIV
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 14.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA XV
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 15.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA XVI
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 16.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA XVII
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 17.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA XVIII
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 18.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA XIX
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 19.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA XX
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 20.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: METAREA XXI
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: METAREA 21.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: significantWaveHeightWarningThreshold
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Represents the significant wave height warning that has been exceeded or is forecast to be exceeded based on predetermined bins of significant wave height values.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: two and a half to four metres
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Significant wave heights between 2.5 and 4 metres (8-13 feet) are forecast or occurring.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: four to six metres
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Significant wave heights between 4 and 6 metres (13-20 feet) are forecast or occurring.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: six to nine metres
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Significant wave heights between 6 and 9 metres (20-30 feet) are forecast or occurring.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: nine to fourteen metres
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Significant wave heights between 9 and 14 metres (30-45 feet) are forecast or occurring.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: greater than fourteen metres
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Significant wave heights greater than 14 metres (>45 feet) are forecast or occurring.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: text
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A non-formatted digital text string.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Should be used, for example, to hold the information that is for short cautionary or explanatory notes. Therefore, text populated in text must not exceed 300 characters. Text may be in English, or in a national language. No formatting of text is possible within text. If formatted text, or text strings exceeding 300 characters, is required, then an alternate concept should be used.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: language
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The method of human communication, either spoken or written, consisting of the use of words in a structured and conventional way.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: The language is encoded by a 3 character code following ISO 639-2/T.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: agencyName
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The name of an agency, entity or organization.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: mailingAddress
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The physical address a parcel may be sent to.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: telephoneNumber
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The telephone number of an entity.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: emailAddress
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Identifies an email box to which email messages are delivered.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: webAddress
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A reference to a web resource that specifies its location on a computer network and a mechanism for retrieving it.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: countryName
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The name of a nation.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: dateStart
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: dateStart

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: dateEnd
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: dateEnd

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: issueDate
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The time, expressed in Universal Time Coordinated (UTC) at which an object and its attributes are issued from an agency.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: 19850412T183059 denotes 18 hours, 30 minutes, and 59 seconds on 12 April 1985.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: weatherWarningNumber
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Identification number given to a specifc weather warning.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: cancellationDate
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Date and time of cancelling a notice or warning.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: nextUpdateDateTime
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The time, expressed in Universal Time Coordinated (UTC) an object and its attributes are scheduled to be updated.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Unit: Years, months, days, hours, minutes, secondsResolution:1 secondFormat: YYYYMMDDTHHMMSS, where Y is year, M is month, D is day, H is hour, M is minute, and S is secondExample: 19850412T183059 denotes 18 hours, 30 minutes, 59 seconds on 12 April 1985.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: interoperabilityIdentifier
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: interoperabilityIdentifier

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: timeOfDayStart
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: timeOfDayStart

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: timeOfDayEnd
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: timeOfDayEnd

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: fileReference
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: fileReference

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: sourceOfIcing
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The type of weather phenomenon causing hazardous ice accretion.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: freezingSpray
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Sea spray transported through air at temperatures below 0C.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: freezingRain
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Precipitation drops freezing on impact to form a coating of clear ice (glaze) on the ground and on exposed objects.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: freezingFog
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Tiny, supercooled liquid water droplets in fog can freeze instantly on exposed surfaces when surface temperatures are at or below freezing.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: otherIcingSource
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Source of icing is unknown or is different from other types of icing sources.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: windWarningThreshold
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: Represents the wind warning that has been exceeded or forecast to be exceeded.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: near gale force
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind speeds between 28 and 33 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 7) are forecast or occurring.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: gale force
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind speeds between 34 and 47 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 8 and 9) are forecast or occurring.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: storm force
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Wind speeds between 48 and 63 knots (Beaufort scale wind force 10 or 11) are forecast or occurring.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: hurricane force
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Sustained wind speeds 64 knots or higher (Beaufort scale wind force 12) are forecast or occurring.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: contactInformation
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Information about where inquiries can be sent.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: fixedDateRange
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: An active period of a single fixed event or occurrence, as the date range between discrete start and end dates.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Dates must be encoded in the format YYYYMMDD; using 4 digits for the calendar year (YYYY) and, optionally, 2 digits for the month (MM) (for example April = 04) and 2 digits for the day (DD). When no specific month and/or day is required/known, the values are replaced with dashes (-). The date range of a recurring event or occurrence must be encoded using periodicDateRange.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: issuingService
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The number of the METAREA, name of the Nation, and the National Meteorological and Hydrological Service (NMHS) or National Authority that broadcast the warning.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: issuingServiceName
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The identifier that indicates which organization issued meteorological and oceanographic data.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: maximumWindSpeed
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: When applied to a warning or forecast polygon, refers to the maximum wind speed or range of wind speeds found within the contour of the polygon.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: preparationService
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The name of the Nation and National Meteorological and Hydrological Service (NMHS) or National Authority that prepared the warning and transferred it to the relevant Issuing Service for broadcast if not the same.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: weatherWarningMessage
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Text message associated with a weather warning polygon.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: informationProvidedFor
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to a specific feature(s) for which further information is required.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: dataProviderInformation
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to an object that provides information about the data providers for the particular object

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: DataProviderAssociation
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: An association that binds information about the data provider to features

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: DataProvider
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: The national authority providing a data in an official capacity.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: WeatherWarning
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A product issued by a national authority when a specific weather scenario or event threatens people or property meets criteria defined by WMO (WMO No. 558 and No. 471) or by a national authority where applicable.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: IceAccretionWarning
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A product issued by a national authority when ice accumulation rates pose a hazard to vessels.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: RestrictedVisibilityWarning
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A product issued by a national authority when horizontal visibility is degraded to less than 0.5 nautical miles by fog, smoke, dust, haze, heavy precipitation, or any other phenomena.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: SignificantWaveHeightWarning
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A product issued by a national authority when sea state conditions pose a hazard or are life-threatening.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: ThunderstormWarning
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A product issued by a national authority when an area of thunderstorms or squalls poses a hazard. Conditions could include strong winds, locally higher waves, potentially heavy precipitation, hail, and dangerous lightning strikes.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: WindWarning
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A product issued by a national authority when high wind speeds pose a hazard or are life-threatening.
